description: "This map of Asia, from an atlas by the German cartographer Karl von Spruner, is colour-coded to show territorial regions in Asia from the 6th to the 9th centuries. Thailand is labelled 'Siang-koue' and Vietnam is 'Tschn-tschin'."
title: "Asien   vom   VIten   bis   in   die   erste   Hälfte   des   IXten   Jahrhunderts   (Asia   from   the   six   to   the   first   half   of   the   ninth   century)"
